text: happy holidays today I'm making a super

want to start off by melting two pounds

are my three favorites if you're only
gonna have a couple of ingredients you

pounds and just melt it now I'm not
tempering this I'm just gonna keep it in

as well as your chocolates melting don't

once in a while you can also do this in

you're melting chocolate in a double
boiler like this is a heatproof bowl set
over a pot of simmering water don't let
the bottom of the bowl touch the water
otherwise it could burn your chocolate
so have the water about I would say an
inch and a half in the pot just to make
sure that it doesn't boil away but not
high enough that it's gonna be touching
the bottom of your bowl and the bowl
needs to be big enough that it doesn't
sit down into the pot because the last
thing in the world that you want is for

that will cause your chocolate to seize
and cease chocolate turns into these
little granules that are completely

able to continue melting it in fact

now you add your chopped up candy canes
